title: Data Analyst
description: Looking for someone with experience in Python, SQL, and data visualization using tools like Power BI or Tableau. Knowledge of statistics is a plus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Strong programming skills in Python, experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch, and a good understanding of machine learning algorithms.

title: Software Developer
description: Proficient in Java, C++, or Python. Must have experience with software development practices, testing, and version control systems like Git.
